<h3 id="X690">X(690)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CROSSDIFFERENCE OF LINE X(6) AND X(110)</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; bc(b<sup>2</sup> - c<sup>2</sup>)(2a<sup>2</sup> - b<sup>2</sup> - c<sup>2</sup>) : :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (cot B - cot C) (2 cot A - cot B - cot C) : :

<p>
Let NaNbNc and Na'Nb'Nc' be the outer and inner Napoleon triangles, respectively.  Let A' be the isogonal conjugate of Na wrt Na'Nb'Nc', and define B' and C' cyclically.  Let A&Prime; be the isogonal conjugate of Na' wrt NaNbNc, and define B&Prime; and C&Prime; cyclically.  The lines A'A&Prime;, B'B&Prime;, C'C&Prime; concur in X(690).  (Randy Hutson, November 30, 2015)
</p>
<p>
As the isogonal conjugate of a point on the circumcircle, X(690) lies on the line at infinity.
</p>
<p>
X(690) lies on these (parallel) lines: {2, 5465}, {3, 6334}, {4, 11005}, {5, 39509}, {6, 36880}, {10, 18004}, {13, 16255}, {14, 16256}, {30, 511}, {39, 2491}, {67, 10097}, {69, 13232}, {74, 98}, {76, </p>
<p>
X(690) = isogonal conjugate of X(691)<br>
X(690) = isotomic conjugate of X(892)<br>
X(690) = X(67)-Ceva conjugate of X(125)<br>
X(690) = crosssum of X(i) and X(j) for these (i,j): (6,351), (187,512), (523,858)<br>
X(690) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line X(6)X(110)<br>
X(690) = orthopoint of X(542)<br>
X(690) = X(2)-Ceva conjugate of X(23992)<br>
X(690) = polar conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(14417)<br>
X(690) = X(523)-of-1st-Brocard-triangle<br>
X(690) = X(512)-of-4th-Brocard-triangle<br>
X(690) = X(512)-of-orthocentroidal-triangle<br>
X(690) = X(512)-of-X(4)-Brocard-triangle<br>
X(690) = X(1499)-of-McCay-triangle<br>
X(690) = X(1499)-of-anti-McCay-triangle<br>
X(690) = crosspoint of X(I) and X(J) for these (I,J): (99,671), (110,1177)<br>
X(690) = intersection of tangents to Steiner inellipse at X(115) and X(2482)<br>
X(690) = crosspoint wrt medial triangle of X(115) and X(2482)<br>
X(690) = trilinear pole of line X(1648)X(1649)<br>
X(690) = barycentric product X(523)*X(524)<br>
X(690) = 1st-Brocard-isogonal conjugate of X(1316)<br>
X(690) = 1st-Brocard-isotomic conjugate of X(6)<br>
X(690) = isogonal conjugate of the anticomplement of X(5099)<br>
X(690) = isotomic conjugate of the anticomplement of X(23992)<br>
X(690) = isotomic conjugate of the complement of X(39356)<br>
X(690) = isotomic conjugate of the isogonal conjugate of X(351)<br>
X(690) = isogonal conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(35522)<br>
X(690) = isotomic conjugate of the polar conjugate of X(14273)<br>
X(690) = polar conjugate of the isotomic conjugate of X(14417)<br>
X(690) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): {2, 9144, 5465}, {2, 9185, 9189}, {3, 14270, 39477}, {4, 18331, 11005}, {4, 44427, 16230}, {10, 22037, 18004}, {74, 22265, 98}, {99, 15342, 110}, {115, 125, 15359}, {115, 15357, 125}, {125, 1637, 42736}, {125, 16278, 115}, {351, 1649, 9125}, {351, 11183, 45680}, {351, 14424, 14417}, {671, 5466, 18007}, {1637, 9148, 45688}, {1640, 3569, 1637}, {2254, 2292, 42666}, {2489, 7652, 7651}, {2682, 35582, 14114}, {3268, 9123, 9168}, {3268, 9147, 45687}, {3268, 39904, 5652}, {3569, 9148, 11182}, {4120, 30574, 14431}, {4750, 14432, 14419}, {5099, 38395, 2682}, {5113, 45693, 11176}, {5652, 9147, 5027}, {5653, 9138, 9208}, {6132, 11615, 6140}, {6321, 15545, 265}, {6699, 33511, 6036}, {7472, 14999, 9181}, {8552, 11615, 6132}, {9123, 9168, 45687}, {9125, 14417, 1649}, {9138, 14698, 14697}, {9138, 14932, 9185}, {9144, 11006, 2}, {9147, 9168, 9123}, {9148, 14420, 1637}, {9148, 36255, 125}, {9180, 14932, 5465}, {9185, 9191, 2}, {9185, 14698, 14932}, {9185, 14932, 14697}, {9194, 9195, 9189}, {9200, 9201, 1637}, {9200, 14447, 9201}, {9201, 14446, 9200}, {9204, 9205, 14417}, {9485, 44010, 9131}, {11176, 24284, 45693}, {13169, 14833, 11161}, {13291, 36255, 1637}, {13636, 13722, 8371}, {14270, 44826, 3}, {14419, 30595, 4750}, {14419, 30605, 14432}, {14420, 42734, 9200}, {14420, 42735, 9201}, {14420, 42737, 13291}, {14446, 14447, 1637}, {14643, 14850, 15561}, {14698, 39905, 5653}, {15357, 16278, 15359}, {30508, 30509, 9168}, {30595, 30605, 14419}, {31953, 42738, 1637}, {32193, 45689, 44564}, {32312, 32313, 351}, {42733, 42738, 115}, {42734, 42735, 9148}, {45327, 45336, 44564}, {45336, 45689, 45692}<br>

</p>
